RumorFact.Text: If Solanum wants to check the time loop control panel, I might find them inside the Ash Twin Project.

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum is already here and is observing the time loop ring's logs.
Solanum just realized I'm in the time loop and that our Sun will explode soon. Using the charged warp core, we might be able to escape an explosion. Seems like we will meet again inside the Vessel.
